summary: A reskin of the steel plate armour set
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at reskinning something for a game.
I am also planning to make a new set using this skin when the mod tools are released so you can both wear the vanilla skin and mine if you so desire.

Installing this reskin:
* Go to your skyrim folder in steam/steamapps/common
* open your data folder
* extract the texture folder contained in the zip file into the data folder
* ........
* And you\'re done !
author: Youri Mulder
